name: ctf-site
description: - Public site under `public/` (served statically) - Intentionally leaked database at `/public/backup/backup_users.db` - Private server-side DB copy at `/backups/acme.db` - Cookie to discover: base64 for user `Funeral` in the DB - Flag delivered via `X-CTF-Flag` header when `TRACKING` matches expected (server-side check)
